main: ^Ground clobber: Grrr, the ground here needs clobbering!
^What do you know about lilac butterfly?
npc: ^Ground clobber: If I punch it enough maybe Ill open a new tunnel and find my friends easier
info: ^Ground clobber: the butterfly girl? I dunno. I overheard some tunnel folks say shes trapped
info2: ^Ground clobber: my leader? Im not in a faction. I kinda just got lost in here...
^Ground clobber: I hope they dont realise Im not one of them. The tunnel people can be scary to outsiders
